- Deposit Saber LP into mSOL/SOL on Quarry.so

account.descriptionLink:
- Stake SOL on https://lido.fi/solana and obtain stSOL
- Add stSOL proceeds from above + SOL on Aldrin stSOL/SOL (ratios in the pool might be slight different, but total sum must be 3000 SOL) 
- Deposit LP into stSOL/SOL Farm on Aldrin exchange
account.name: [INVESTMENT] SOL deployment - stSOL-SOL on Aldrin

account.descriptionLink:
- Stake 170 SOL on https://lido.fi/solana and obtain stSOL
- Add stSOL proceeds from above + 830 SOL on Aldrin stSOL/SOL (ratios in the pool might be slight different than 17/83, but total sum must be 1000 SOL)
- Deposit LP into stSOL/SOL Farm on Aldrin exchange

As per https://forum.meta-collective.digital/t/investment-sol-deployment-liquid-staking/63/12
account.name: [INVESTMENT] SOL deployment - stSOL-SOL on Aldrin (part 2)

account.descriptionLink: Solana is going through high volatility and we currenlty own USDH (debt) from Hubble protocol. We are adding 250 SOL as collateral so the position is safer. Another investment proposal should decide whether the pay the debt (burn the USDH) or mint more mSOL for collateral to reach 50% LTV.
account.name: [COUNCIL] Add SOL collateral to Hubble
